controls.title: Ensure auditd is installed
controls.description: auditd is the userspace component to the Linux Auditing System

controls.title: Ensure auditd service is enabled and active
controls.description: Turn on the auditd daemon to record system events

controls.title: Ensure auditing for processes that start prior to auditd is enabled
controls.description: Configure grub to audit processes that start before auditd
controls.remediation: Edit /etc/default/grub and add audit=1 to GRUB_CMDLINE_LINUX

controls.title: Ensure audit_backlog_limit is sufficient
controls.description: The backlog limit determines how many audit records can be queued
controls.remediation: Edit /etc/default/grub and add audit_backlog_limit=8192 to GRUB_CMDLINE_LINUX
